units.title: scATAC-seq assay
units.text: scATAC-seq was performed cell state accessible at differentially accessible peaks.
units.rationale: Describes the execution of the scATAC-seq experiment.

units.title: snRNA-seq of adult cortical tissue
units.text: snRNA-seq was performed on sliced tissue cubes dissected from adult human, chimpanzee or bonobo, and macaque frozen prefrontal cortex tissue.
units.rationale: Specifies the snRNA-seq procedure applied to adult brain samples.
